title: Phone hangs up after 15-17 seconds
content:
I completely reset my phone the other day due to slow activity and poor battery life. After the reset, whenever I get or make a phone call the phone hangs up after 15-17 seconds. 

Some details:
the phone is up to date
i have not tried safe mode
(unsure if this is relevant, but it wasn't present before) when I make a phone call, the screen says "waiting for caller to join RTT)
this happens for every outbound and inbound call
i do have the app Truecaller to filter spam, but the issue occurs without Truecaller as well

thank you in advance!

Theresa
